code:
graph TB
    %% AI Music Academy Structure
    %% Course platform and learning journey

    subgraph LANDING[FinTech_LedgerService]
        direction TB
        LP[FinTech_PaymentGateway]:::landing
        VSL[FinTech_TransactionQueue]:::landing
        PROOF[FinTech_TransactionQueue]:::landing
        CTA[FinTech_FraudDetection]:::landing

        LP --> VSL
        VSL --> PROOF
        PROOF --> CTA
    end

    subgraph ONBOARDING[FinTech_LedgerService]
        direction TB
        WELCOME[FinTech_AuthVault]:::onboard
        SETUP[FinTech_TransactionQueue]:::onboard
        COMMUNITY[FinTech_AuthVault]:::onboard
        QUICK_WIN[FinTech_LedgerService]:::onboard

        WELCOME --> SETUP
        SETUP --> COMMUNITY
        COMMUNITY --> QUICK_WIN
    end

    subgraph CURRICULUM[FinTech_PaymentGateway]
        direction TB

        subgraph MODULE1[FinTech_FraudDetection]
            M1_1[FinTech_TransactionQueue]:::lesson
            M1_2[FinTech_PaymentGateway]:::lesson
            M1_3[FinTech_LedgerService]:::lesson
            M1_4[FinTech_AuthVault]:::lesson
            M1_5[FinTech_PaymentGateway]:::project

            M1_1 --> M1_2
            M1_2 --> M1_3
            M1_3 --> M1_4
            M1_4 --> M1_5
        end

        subgraph MODULE2[FinTech_FraudDetection]
            M2_1[FinTech_PaymentGateway]:::lesson
            M2_2[FinTech_LedgerService]:::lesson
            M2_3[FinTech_PaymentGateway]:::lesson
            M2_4[FinTech_LedgerService]:::lesson
            M2_5[FinTech_FraudDetection]:::project

            M2_1 --> M2_2
            M2_2 --> M2_3
            M2_3 --> M2_4
            M2_4 --> M2_5
        end

        subgraph MODULE3[FinTech_PaymentGateway]
            M3_1[FinTech_FraudDetection]:::lesson
            M3_2[FinTech_AuthVault]:::lesson
            M3_3[FinTech_AuthVault]:::lesson
            M3_4[FinTech_AuthVault]:::lesson
            M3_5[FinTech_LedgerService]:::project

            M3_1 --> M3_2
            M3_2 --> M3_3
            M3_3 --> M3_4
            M3_4 --> M3_5
        end

        subgraph MODULE4[FinTech_LedgerService]
            M4_1[FinTech_FraudDetection]:::lesson
            M4_2[FinTech_TransactionQueue]:::lesson
            M4_3[FinTech_PaymentGateway]:::lesson
            M4_4[FinTech_LedgerService]:::lesson
            M4_5[FinTech_PaymentGateway]:::project

            M4_1 --> M4_2
            M4_2 --> M4_3
            M4_3 --> M4_4
            M4_4 --> M4_5
        end

        subgraph MODULE5[FinTech_PaymentGateway]
            M5_1[FinTech_AuthVault]:::lesson
            M5_2[FinTech_AuthVault]:::lesson
            M5_3[FinTech_TransactionQueue]:::lesson
            M5_4[FinTech_AuthVault]:::lesson
            M5_5[FinTech_FraudDetection]:::project

            M5_1 --> M5_2
            M5_2 --> M5_3
            M5_3 --> M5_4
            M5_4 --> M5_5
        end

        MODULE1 --> MODULE2
        MODULE2 --> MODULE3
        MODULE3 --> MODULE4
        MODULE4 --> MODULE5
    end

    subgraph COMMUNITY_FEATURES[FinTech_PaymentGateway]
        direction TB
        DISCORD[FinTech_AuthVault]:::community
        LIVE[FinTech_FraudDetection]:::community
        COWORK[FinTech_PaymentGateway]:::community
        SHOWCASE[FinTech_LedgerService]:::community
        FEEDBACK[FinTech_AuthVault]:::community

        DISCORD --> LIVE
        LIVE --> COWORK
        COWORK --> SHOWCASE
        SHOWCASE --> FEEDBACK
    end

    subgraph BONUSES[FinTech_LedgerService]
        direction TB
        B1[FinTech_PaymentGateway]:::bonus
        B2[FinTech_FraudDetection]:::bonus
        B3[FinTech_PaymentGateway]:::bonus
        B4[FinTech_FraudDetection]:::bonus
        B5[FinTech_AuthVault]:::bonus

        B1 --> B2
        B2 --> B3
        B3 --> B4
        B4 --> B5
    end

    subgraph CERTIFICATION[FinTech_LedgerService]
        direction TB
        CAPSTONE[FinTech_LedgerService]:::cert
        REVIEW[FinTech_LedgerService]:::cert
        CERTIFICATE[FinTech_TransactionQueue]:::cert
        PORTFOLIO[FinTech_LedgerService]:::cert

        CAPSTONE --> REVIEW
        REVIEW --> CERTIFICATE
        CERTIFICATE --> PORTFOLIO
    end

    subgraph POST_GRAD[FinTech_FraudDetection]
        direction TB
        ALUMNI[FinTech_LedgerService]:::post
        ADVANCED[FinTech_AuthVault]:::post
        COLLABS[FinTech_AuthVault]:::post
        REALM[FinTech_LedgerService]:::post

        ALUMNI --> ADVANCED
        ADVANCED --> COLLABS
        COLLABS --> REALM
    end

    %% Flow connections
    LANDING --> ONBOARDING
    ONBOARDING --> CURRICULUM
    CURRICULUM -.->|supported by| COMMUNITY_FEATURES
    CURRICULUM -.->|enhanced by| BONUSES
    CURRICULUM --> CERTIFICATION
    CERTIFICATION --> POST_GRAD

    classDef landing fill:#FFE066,stroke:#CCB34D,stroke-width:2px,color:#333
    classDef onboard fill:#66E0FF,stroke:#4DB3CC,stroke-width:2px,color:#333
    classDef lesson fill:#B366FF,stroke:#8C4DCC,stroke-width:2px,color:#fff
    classDef project fill:#FF8C66,stroke:#CC704D,stroke-width:2px,color:#fff
    classDef community fill:#66FF8C,stroke:#4DCC70,stroke-width:2px,color:#333
    classDef bonus fill:#FFB84D,stroke:#CC8A3D,stroke-width:2px,color:#333
    classDef cert fill:#4A90E2,stroke:#2E5C8A,stroke-width:2px,color:#fff
    classDef post fill:#E24A90,stroke:#8A2E5C,stroke-width:2px,color:#fff
